sentences.english: Note that the list may also include devices that are not floppy drives.
sentences.chinese: 注意，列表中可能還包括了一些非軟碟機的裝置。

sentences.english: No standard floppy drive was found.
Can not save them to a network drive or a floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 不能救他們到一個網路磁碟或一個軟碟。

sentences.english: Could not display help for the floppy formatter.
sentences.chinese: 無法顯示軟碟格式化程式的說明文件。

sentences.english: Use floppy to read NC program machining.
sentences.chinese: 可利用軟碟讀取NC碼加工。

sentences.english: Please make sure that the correct floppy is in the drive.
sentences.chinese: 請確認軟碟機中是否已放入了正確的磁碟片。

sentences.english: A good choice is to create a copy of this file onto a diskette or other removeable media.
sentences.chinese: 最好是把私鑰檔備份到軟碟或光碟中。

sentences.english: Has your laptop got a floppy disc or a CD drive?
sentences.chinese: 你的膝上型電腦有軟碟機還是光碟機。

sentences.english: Structure imposed on a floppy disc by an operating system utility program.
sentences.chinese: 軟碟被電腦操作系統的應用程序所造成的結構。
